name: AS_GSS_UT_copyEvaluationData
description: Rule to copy data from source evaluation to duplicated evaluation
sail_code:
#"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
  ri!targetEvaluation,
  {
    "evaluationDesc",
    "evaluationMethod",
    "isSignaturesRequired",
    "isWeightedFactorsRequired",
    "duplicatedFromEvaluationId",
    "evaluationStatus",
    "sourceApplication",
    "isActive"
  },
  {
    ri!sourceEvaluation.evaluationDesc,
    ri!sourceEvaluation.evaluationMethod,
    ri!sourceEvaluation.isSignaturesRequired,
    ri!sourceEvaluation.isWeightedFactorsRequired,
    ri!sourceEvaluation.evaluationId,
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
      data: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
        refDataId: ri!targetEvaluation.evaluationStatus.refDataId
      ),
      index: "refDataId",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP
    ),
    'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
      refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GSS
    ),
    false()
  }
)
